mapper.insert: insert into QUESTION_TB (id, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, CATEGORY_ID) values ( (select NVL(max(id), 0) from question_tb ) + 1, #{title}, #{content}, #{user_id}, #{category_id})
mapper.select: SELECT q1.category_id, q1.id, q1.title, q1.content, q1.replied, q2.category, q1.user_id, q1.created_date, deleted FROM question_tb q1, question_category_tb q2 WHERE (q1.category_id=q2.id) and (q1.user_id = #{user_id}) order by id desc

select category_id, id, title, content, replied, category, user_id, created_date, deleted from (select rownum rn, q1.category_id, q1.id, q1.title, q1.content, q1.replied, q2.category, q1.user_id, q1.created_date, deleted FROM question_tb q1, question_category_tb q2 WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and (q1.category_id=q2.id) and (q1.user_id = #{user_id}) order by id desc) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1)*#{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION_TB SET DELETED = 1 WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM QUESTION_TB WHERE DELETED = 0 and user_id = #{user_id}
